channel.title: Client problems 508 problems help me please! =]
channel.description:
Ok take a look at the pictures http://www.flickr.com/photos/34530462@N04/3209937828/
http://www.flickr.com/photos/34530462@N04/3209091563/
incase you couldnt see the .bat test it says java is not reconized as an internal or external command operable program or .bat file. where do i edit in the runserver.bat TO FIX THIS! it never happened before then all of a sudden boom!

item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

I thought the code was

@ECHO OFF TITLE Client color 0a JAVA -Xmx500m MAIN PAUSE

I thought you needed to run main.java not EGUI to start the server…

item.title: Client problems 508 problems help me please! =]

item.description:

its any runserver.bat file that i open… it will say error

heres the code inside the clients runserver.bat

@ECHO OFF
TITLE Client
color 0a
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
PAUSE
